entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Mac] Light up HideSoftInputOnTapped for Catalyst #21528
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [Android] TapGestureRecognizer on a parent View is not working if a child View has TooltipProperties.Text set and tapping on it #21527
  • MAUI app crashes on Android in debug mode and has errors in release mode #21525
  • Declared IsGestureEnabled = false but Flyout menu is still work on MAUI .NET8 Android #21522

Closed

  • SetAppThemeColor crashes with NRE #21503
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Running an iOS app using the command 'sudo dotnet build -t:Run -f net8.0-ios' gets stuck #20280
  • Interop registered singleton cant be used in Blazor Hybrid #20499
  • [Android]System.TypeLoadException: Could not resolve type with token 01000004 from typeref #21256
  • On Android when you add a NavigationPage to the FlyoutPage.Flyout, an exception is thrown #21515
  • Memoryleak VisualstateManager in ButtonStyle on Android #21389
    Backlog
  • Polylines make application unresponsive. #21292

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] improve FormattedString performance #21530
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Light up HideSoftInputOnTappedChanged for catalyst #21529
  • BindableObject System.NullReferenceException when bindings queue gets messed up #21523
    community ✨

Merged

  • fix 21503 #21524
  • [xaml] improve performance in debug-mode #21460
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [C] fix a leak in VSG #21484
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️

Updated

  • [Windows] Prevent image from covering text in buttons if the image is too big #21516
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Span] Improve formatting inheritance #21191
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [iOS] Fixed RadioButton text related properties not working #20366
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-radiobutton
  • [WinUI] Allocate less when updating gestures #21450
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [CI] Clean all yaml in the pipelines of warnings and errors and add a workflow to validate the yaml used. #21345
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Document NavigableElement #21507
    area/navigation 🧭
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, control-titleview
  • [Android] Span line height fix #20352
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, stale
  • fix issue in orientation of images #21458
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
